title: Farm Operating Loan Application Support
description: A farmer needs to compile financial documents to apply for an annual operating loan.

tasks.description: Generate a balance sheet from the farm's accounting software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the balance sheet.

tasks.description: Generate a cash flow projection for the upcoming year based on planned crops and historical expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a detailed cash flow projection.

tasks.description: Compile the generated reports into a single loan application package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a zip file with all the required financial documents.
